page.title: 11HOMOEOPATHY - WALL.
page.content: Living in "Madeley Cottage" Wall Lane is a gentleman who is a practitioner in Homoeopathic medicine. He is a director of "The Centre for Alternative Therapy" Rugeley. Homoeopathy is based on the law of similars. The word itself comes from the Greek-Homion meaning "Similar" and Pathos meaning "Disease". The Law of Similars means that a remedy which creates symptoms and conditions in a healthy person will cure a sick person manifesting similar symptoms. Homoeopathy is based on the principle that "like cures like"; homoeopaths believe that a sick person's symptoms are a sign of the body's battle against illness and they try to stimulate, rather than suppress this reaction. Health foods are also proving to be much in demand at his shop in Rugeley.
